project.name: Neptus
project.description:
For simple use the main targets are: - "info" for project information - "clean" to clean the build folder
- "jar" (or "jar-force") to create all jars (the force will delete the the jars first)
- "distribution-all" for all flavors (or individually "distribution-full", "distribution-seacon", or "distribution-le")
